verses.plain: When Israel went out of Egypt, the house of Jacob from a people of strange language;

tokens.t: When Israel went out of Egypt, the house of Jacob from a people of strange language;

verses.plain: Judah was his sanctuary, and Israel his dominion.
The sea saw it, and fled: Jordan was driven back.

tokens.t: , and fled: Jordan was driven back.

verses.plain: The mountains skipped like rams, and the little hills like lambs.
What ailed thee, O thou sea, that thou fleddest? thou Jordan, that thou wast driven back?

tokens.t: thee, O thou sea, that thou fleddest? thou Jordan,

verses.plain: Ye mountains, that ye skipped like rams; and ye little hills, like lambs?
Tremble, thou earth, at the presence of the Lord, at the presence of the God of Jacob;

tokens.t: Tremble, thou earth, at the presence of the Lord, at the presence of the God of Jacob;

verses.plain: Which turned the rock into a standing water, the flint into a fountain of waters.

tokens.t: a standing water, the flint into a fountain of waters.
